document.full_text: giovanni romano, a native of new york, is the chef at the backroom bistro in sioux center, iowa. his cooking has won over local residents, who keep coming back for more.
document.title: giving rural iowans a taste of italy
lines_and_colors: giovanni romano, a native of new york, is the chef at the backroom bistro in sioux center, iowa. his cooking has won over local residents, who keep coming back for more.
